text:
No problem Charis! You'll have to be patient with me too from time to time, although I will do my best to respond as soon as I can! If you ever have anything time sensitive that you need feedback or advice on, you can email me at <mailto:kat.seale@gmail.com|kat.seale@gmail.com> and I'll get on it for you!!

Honest advice on animation I can definitely do! I'll set us up a shared dropbox folder that you can drop your anim into, and I can either write up, record or do some drawovers for feedback for you ^^ Feel free to drop stuff in there whenever you like and then just shoot me a message so I know to check it!

That would be amazing, thank you! My email is <mailto:charisdussek@gmail.com|charisdussek@gmail.com>, if you could send the dropbox invite to that thatd be perfect! 
On the topic of london based studios, i know of bluezoo, dneg and studio aka, but was wondering if you could tell me more about Mikros? What sort of stuff do they do? Also, is there a different atmosphere amongst the studios youve worked at? Where have you enjoyed working most?
